COLOR = ['red', 'yellow', 'green', 'blue', '--']
plt.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = [15, 15]
plt1 = plt.subplot(211)
plt2 = plt.subplot(212)
x1 = range(2000)
x2 = range(0, 2000, 5)
plt1.plot(x1, batch_x[(INDEX), :], 'black')
for i in range(5):
    plt2.plot(x2, prob_val[(INDEX), :, (i)], COLOR[i])
